name: Masters in Unity
description:
This is a 3D puzzle game and in the game, the player is the relic restorer who is piecing together Chinese antiques thousands of years old. The game is inspired from the documentary Masters in Forbidden City.

How to play:

The player needs to drag all the broken pieces to the correct position to finish restoring. After puzzling all the antiques, there will be introductions for every antique.

Left click - drag the broken pieces

Right click - go back

Space - skip the text

Developer: Judy Mao

Art Direction: Ellie Zhu, Leo Zhang & Hana Che
